definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: darkness, gloominess, calamity—´[[א]] Ex 10:22 +; [[אֲפֵלָתְךָ]] Is 58:10; pl. [[אֲפֵלוֹת]] Is 59:9—

darkness De 28:29, Pr 7:9 (‖[[אִישׁוֹן לַיְלָה]]); of supernatural darkness in Egypt Ex 10:22; of day of . ´[[י]] (cf. Am 5:20 sub [[סאָפֵל]] ) Joe 2:2, Zep 1:15 (both ‖[[חשׁך]] [[ענן]], [[רְפל]]) sim. of wickedness Je 23:18, Pr 4:19.
